message: ...and a link says "Article: How to figure out your character's arc" and I'm thinking, @#!$@ #@#% $%%, why don't these people just go to Story Fanatic and read what's there, dammit!

Then I scroll down and see STORY FANATIC: the article title and written by James Hull.  I laughed out loud.  

Good job, Jim!  Congrats on getting more exposure to your wonderful site.
lol thanks - its been going on for a couple years now - they borrow one of my articles for their monthly newsletter (and I'm thankful for the exposure as well!)
